t: Amazon Finally Reveals Who Makes Its Branded Products | by Sarah Emerson | OneZero
s: December 12, 2021 - Amazon has revealed the companies that make its branded products for the first time. The e-commerce giant published a list of suppliers on its website earlier this month that details the names and locations of manufacturers all over the world that produce official Amazon apparel, consumer electronics, and housewares.
